properties.name: spring.task.base-thread-pool.allow-core-thread-time-out
properties.description:
核心线程是否允许超时，默认 false

Whether the core thread allows timeouts. Default: false

properties.name: spring.task.base-thread-pool.await-termination-seconds
properties.description:
IOC容器关闭时未完成任务等待时间，单位秒，默认 10

与waitForTasksToCompleteOnShutdown同时配置

The waiting seconds for incomplete tasks when the IOC container is closed. Default: false

Configured at the same time as waitForTasksToCompleteOnShutdown.

properties.name: spring.task.base-thread-pool.core-pool-size
properties.description:
核心线程数，默认 可使用处理器数*2

Core pool size. Default: CPUS*2

properties.name: spring.task.base-thread-pool.keep-alive-seconds
properties.description:
空闲线程存活时间，单位秒，默认 60

Idle threads keep alive seconds. Default: 60

properties.name: spring.task.base-thread-pool.max-pool-size
properties.description:
最大线程数，默认 核心线程数*2

Max pool size. Default: THREAD_CORE_SIZE*2

properties.name: spring.task.base-thread-pool.queue-capacity
properties.description:
队列深度,默认 最大线程数*2

Depth of queue. Default: THREAD_MAX_SIZE*2

properties.name: spring.task.base-thread-pool.rejected-execution-handler
properties.description:
拒绝策略，默认 AbortPolicy

Deny policy. Default: AbortPolicy

AbortPolicy: 丢弃任务并抛出RejectedExecutionException异常

DiscardPolicy: 丢弃任务但不抛出异常

DiscardOldestPolicy: 丢弃最旧的处理程序，然后重试，如果执行器关闭，这时丢弃任务

CallerRunsPolicy: 执行器执行任务失败，则在策略回调方法中执行任务，如果执行器关闭，这时丢弃任务

properties.name: spring.task.base-thread-pool.thread-name-prefix
properties.description:
自定义线程名前缀，默认 Async-ThreadPool-

Thread name prefix. Default: Async-ThreadPool-

properties.name: spring.task.base-thread-pool.wait-for-tasks-to-complete-on-shutdown
properties.description:
IOC容器关闭时是否等待未完成任务，默认 false

与awaitTerminationSeconds同时配置

Whether to wait for outstanding tasks when the IOC container is closed. Default: false

Configured at the same time as awaitTerminationSeconds.
